comment.author: 14745651@N00
comment._content: "from one o fthe photos above you can see "147" in the golden's sign, google that you get this link books.google.com/books?id=x2jZAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA582&... for "147 fourth ave" german american bank. an apartment building was built in its place in the 1960s according to nyc dob records

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: lucky_dog: Thank you for finding the street address of this bank. We will add it to the image descriptions when we update. The New York Public Library has several earlier images (front views) of what appears to be the same building. The back of this one, confirms the address as Fourth Avenue and Fourteenth Street: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?G91F197_004F
